mod.name: The Dragonkin
mod.description: A Warrior of Fire and Faith. Determined the slay the Evils of the Spire.

cards.name: Meteor Storm
cards.description:
thedragonkin:Dragon_Breath.
Deal 3 damage twice.
Gain 3 Block twice.
return this from the discard pile to your hand.

thedragonkin:Dragon_Breath.

Gain 5 Block twice.
return this from the discard pile to your hand.

relics.name: Garnet Scales
relics.description: After you play your first Holy card each turn, gain 4 Block.
relics.flavorText: They Pulse with the Warmth of a Dragon's Fury.

relics.name: Burning Fragment
relics.description: The First time you draw a Status each turn draw a card and gain 6 Temporary HP.

relics.name: Ferno's Bellows
relics.description: After you Generate a Burn Apply 4 Scorch to all Enemies.
relics.flavorText: Forge Dragon Bellows turn the slightest Spark into a Roaring Blaze.

relics.name: Muky Sludge
relics.description: At the end of your Turn, ALL enemies lose HP equal to their Dissolve.
relics.flavorText: A Toxic Sludge that can dissolve even metal.

relics.name: Book of Hymns
relics.description: The first time you lose Temporary HP or Block each combat gain 2 Zeal.
relics.flavorText: A Book of Crusader Hymns, telling tales of Heroism in the name of Naruuin.

relics.name: Bottled Voice
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a Dragon Breath. Play it at the start of each combat.
relics.flavorText: "Zulko,Gol Ahrk,Lokbo,Pahfen Honhiin Rein!" - A Draconic Proverb

relics.name: Tilera's Shield
relics.description: Upon pickup, heal 1 for each relic you have. Whenever you obtain a relic, gain 3 max HP.
relics.flavorText: The Aegis of Great Commander Tilera, It stopped many weapons and armored her in Golden Light.

relics.name: Sunblessed Charm
relics.description: Gain 1 Zeal at the start of each combat.

relics.name: Crystallized Dragonbreath
relics.description: You first Dragon Breath played each turn Costs 0 and draws you a card. Your Dragon Breaths take an extra turn to release.
relics.flavorText: An Airborne Deposition of gaseous Dragonbreath, simply bottling this substance as a gas has countless alchemical applications.

relics.name: Obsidian Scales
relics.description:
Replaces Garnet Scales.
After you play your first Primal card each turn, gain 4 Fury.
relics.flavorText: These cursed Scales whisper terrible things, You feel like your Thoughts are no longer your own.

relics.name: Sulfurian
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Shuffle 1 Burns into your Discard pile after taking unblocked damage.
relics.flavorText: The Great Mace of the Molten Core, known to incinerate anything.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:Afterglow
keywords.description: Afterglow effects are activated when you play your next Magic card Dark card excluded, playing a dark card will remove any afterglow effects you have.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:Chill
keywords.description: Chilled enemies take 1 more damage from Ice cards per stack of chill, when a monster has 10 or more points of chill remove them and apply Freeze.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:Crossroads
keywords.description: Choose one of the listed effects to use.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:Dark
keywords.description: Dark cards are not effected by Strength or Dexterity. Playing dark cards will remove your Afterglow and can apply Darken.

keywords.name: Dark Exposure
keywords.description: Increases damage from Magic for a limited time.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:Darken
keywords.description: Darken effects are activated when you play your next Magic card Light card excluded, playing a light card will remove any darken effects you have.

keywords.name: Deep Frost
keywords.description: Increases damage and Block gain for Ice cards.

keywords.name: Dragon Breath
keywords.description:
At the end of turn, Split all Effects listed after this equally between ALL enemies.
Each Dragon Breath increases Future Breaths damage by 2 and other values by 1 this turn.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:Duplicate
keywords.description: Create an exact copy of this card in the discard pile on use.

keywords.name: Energy Shield
keywords.description: Increases block gained by your next block card.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:Fire
keywords.description: Fire cards are not effected by Strength or Dexterity. Playing a fire card gives you Hot Streak until you play a non-fire card.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:Follow-up
keywords.description: When played add a 0 cost copy of the card without follow-up that Purges to you hand.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:Freeze
keywords.description: Frozen enemies take no Ice damage and triple non-magical damage, remove this when effected receives non-magical damage.

keywords.name: Hot Streak
keywords.description: During your turn, if the last card you played was a Fire card activate the following effect.

keywords.name: Hunters Focus
keywords.description: When you have 10 or more Hunters Focus your next attack does triple damage and resets Hunters Focus.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:Ice
keywords.description: Ice cards are not effected by Strength or Dexterity. Dealing damage with Ice cards applies Chill to the target.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:Jolt
keywords.description: Jolted enemies take 10% less Thunder damage per jolted stack.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:Light
keywords.description: Light cards are not effected by Strength or Dexterity. Playing light cards will remove your Darken and can apply Afterglow.

keywords.name: Loptyrian Shadow
keywords.description: Increases damage and Block gain for Dark cards.

keywords.name: Natural Spikes
keywords.description: Natural Spikes damage attackers, but are dulled when you receive unblocked damage.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:Tailwind
keywords.description: Every second wind card you play costs 1 less.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:Thunder
keywords.description: Thunder cards are not effected by Strength or Dexterity. Dealing damage with Thunder cards applies Jolt to the target.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:Wind
keywords.description: Wind cards are not effected by Strength or Dexterity. Every second wind card you play has Tailwind reducing it's cost by 1

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:alignment
keywords.description: Play Lunar or Solar cards to modify your alignment, leaving Neutral alignment at 2 or more points of either type.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:antiquity
keywords.description: You may only have 1 Antiquity power active. Playing an Antiquity power will override other Antiquity powers you may have.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:arcana
keywords.description: Increases damage and Block gain for Magic cards.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:arcane
keywords.description: Arcane cards are only effected by Arcana and Dark Exposure.

keywords.name: Casts
keywords.description: When you play a spell card, reduce it's cast count by 1. When a spell's cast count is 0, it becomes Depleted and unplayable. At rest sites you can Rest to Heal and Replenish spells or Meditate to replenish more spells.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:charged-up
keywords.description: Increases damage and Block gain for Thunder cards.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:cure
keywords.description: Removed the listed number of debuffs from yourself, and perform the listed action equal to it's potency.

keywords.name: Depleted
keywords.description: Unplayable until Casts are restored at a rest site or at the end of the Act.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:dissolve
keywords.description: Loses HP when you play certain Acid cards.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:enchant
keywords.description: Enchanted cards are both Physical and Magical. Being affected the same as a magic card of it's enchantment element as well as a physical card.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:entangled
keywords.description: Entangled enemies become Stunned at the start of their turn if they intend to Attack.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:faded
keywords.description: Cannot be Played or Upgraded.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:fading
keywords.description: Becomes unplayable after being played the listed number of times.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:fury
keywords.description: Fury modifies Primal card damage and is increased by unblocked attack damage.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:galeforce
keywords.description: Increases damage and Block gain for Wind cards.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:holy
keywords.description:
Holy Cards deal more damage and have increased Block gain equal to your Zeal.
Holy Cards also have their other values increased by 1 for every 5 points of Zeal.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:kindling
keywords.description: Increases damage and Block gain for Fire cards.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:luminance
keywords.description: Increases damage and Block gain for Light cards.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:lunar
keywords.description: Perform the listed action if your Lunar Aligntment is equal or greater then the listed value.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:moonstruck
keywords.description: Moonstruck enemies Lose HP equal to your Lunar Alignment when you play a Lunar card a limited number of times.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:primal
keywords.description: Primal Attacks consume Fury to increase damage by half the Fury amount.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:scorch
keywords.description: Scorched creatures take additional damage from Attacks, when attacked reduce this by half

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:solar
keywords.description: Perform the listed action if your Solar Aligntment is equal or greater then the listed value.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:sunburn
keywords.description: Sunburned enemies Give you Block equal to your Solar Alignment when you play Solar cards on them limited number of times.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:transmute
keywords.description: Transmuted cards have their Element temporarily set to the transmutation's element.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:zeal
keywords.description: Zeal modifies Holy cards.
